messages.name: Santhosh
messages.message: Hey! How are you doing today?

messages.name: Santhosh
messages.message: I'm doing great, thanks for asking!

messages.name: Alex
messages.message: That's awesome! What are your plans for the weekend?

messages.name: Alex
messages.message: I'm thinking of going hiking if the weather is nice.
